page.FileManagement 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from knitter.webelement import WebElement
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from knitter import log


[文档]class FilterInput(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='search-input']/input")



[文档]class CreateFolderButton(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[text()='新建文件夹']")



[文档]class CreateFolderDialog():

[文档]    class FolderName(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//label[text()='文件夹名称']/../input")



[文档]    class CreateButton(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[text()='新建']")



[文档]class FileList():

[文档]    class FileListCount(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//table[@class='table fixed-table doc-list-table']/tbody/tr")



[文档]    class FileListItem(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH,"//table[@class='table fixed-table doc-list-table']/tbody/tr[index]/td/a")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def GetFileName(self, index):
            self.value = self.value.replace('index', index)
            return super(FileList.FileListItem, self).GetText()



[文档]    class FileListItemName(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH,"//table[@class='table fixed-table doc-list-table']/tbody/tr/td/a[text()='#@Name']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def VerifyExistence(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            return super(FileList.FileListItemName, self).VerifyExistence(True)




[文档]def VerifyContain(str, substr):
    log.step_normal("Verify whether filter file name [%s] contains filter key[%s]"%(str, substr))

    if str.__contains__(substr):
        log.step_pass('Contains!')
    else:
        log.step_fail('Not contains!')
